org.apache.hama.ml.recommendation

Interface Recommender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OnlineCF

    public interface Recommender
    Recommendation engine that is used to train with BSP. and predict user preferences.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double estimatePreference(long userId, long itemId) 
      List<Preference<Long,Long>> getMostPreferredItems(long userId, int count)
      get most preferred items for user
      boolean load(String path, boolean lazy)
      load model from given path
      boolean save()
      save model
      boolean train()
      train model, default behavior is saving model after train

    • Method Detail

      • train

        boolean train()
        train model, default behavior is saving model after train
        Returns:
        true if success

      • save

        boolean save()
        save model
        Returns:
        true if success

      • load

        boolean load(String path,
           boolean lazy)
        load model from given path
        Parameters:
        path - - path of saved model
        lazy - - some models are bigger than available memory, set this to true if memory is less than data model for faster prediction, set to false if using file access and reading from file is fine in prediction phase
        Returns:
        true if success

      • estimatePreference

        double estimatePreference(long userId,
                        long itemId)
        Parameters:
        userId -
        itemId -
        Returns:
        estimated preference value

                                                int count)
        get most preferred items for user
        Parameters:
        userId -
        count -
        Returns:
        most preferred items with their values
